6043 n = n + m
6044 tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
6045 n = n + m
6046 m = p + 1
6047 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
6048 n = n + m
6049 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
6050 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
6051 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
6052 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
6053 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
6054 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
6055 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
6056 & tmp_m2, work)
6057 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
6058 call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_sk, dst_sk, p, vscales, one, &
6059 & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
6060 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
6061 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
6062 & work)
6063 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
6064 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_m)
6065end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_rotation_adj_work
6066
6090subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
6091 & src_m, beta, dst_m)
6092 ! Inputs
6093 integer, intent(in) :: p
6094 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6095 & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6096 ! Output
6097 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
6098 ! Temporary workspace
6099 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
6100 ! Call corresponding work routine
6101 call fmm_m2m_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, &
6102 & src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
6103end subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj
6104
6129subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6130 & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
6131 ! Inputs
6132 integer, intent(in) :: p
6133 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6134 & vcnk((2*p+1)*(p+1)), alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6135 ! Output
6136 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((p+1)*(p+1))
6137 ! Temporary workspace
6138 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
6139 ! Local variables
6140 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
6141 integer :: m, n
6142 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
6143 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
6144 ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
6145 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
6146 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
6147 if (stheta .eq. 0) then
6148 ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
6149 call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, &
6150 & vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
6151 return
6152 end if
6153 ! Prepare pointers
6154 m = (p+1)**2
6155 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
6156 tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
6157 n = n + m
6158 tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
6159 n = n + m
6160 m = p + 1
6161 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
6162 n = n + m
6163 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
6164 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
6165 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
6166 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
6167 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
6168 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
6169 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
6170 & tmp_m2, work)
6171 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
6172 call fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, &
6173 & one, tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work)
6174 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
6175 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
6176 & work)
6177 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
6178 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_m)
6179end subroutine fmm_m2m_rotation_adj_work
6180
6181subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_grad(p, sph_sk, vscales, sph_m, sph_m_grad)
6182 !! Inputs
6183 integer, intent(in) :: p
6184 real(dp), intent(in) :: sph_sk(p+2), vscales((p+2)**2), &
6185 & sph_m((p+1)**2)
6186 !! Output
6187 real(dp), intent(out) :: sph_m_grad((p+2)**2, 3)
6188 !! Local variables
6189 real(dp), dimension(3, 3) :: zx_coord_transform, zy_coord_transform
6190 real(dp) :: tmp((p+1)**2), tmp2((p+2)**2)
6191 ! Set coordinate transformations
6192 zx_coord_transform = zero
6193 zx_coord_transform(3, 2) = one
6194 zx_coord_transform(2, 3) = one
6195 zx_coord_transform(1, 1) = one
6196 zy_coord_transform = zero
6197 zy_coord_transform(1, 2) = one
6198 zy_coord_transform(2, 1) = one
6199 zy_coord_transform(3, 3) = one
6200 ! Transform input harmonics for OX axis
6201 call fmm_sph_transform(p, zx_coord_transform, one, sph_m, zero, tmp)
6202 ! Differentiate M2M along OZ
6203 call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_sk, p, vscales, &
6204 & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
6205 ! Transform into output harmonics for OX axis
6206 call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zx_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
6207 & sph_m_grad(:, 1))
6208 ! Transform input harmonics for OY axis
6209 call fmm_sph_transform(p, zy_coord_transform, one, sph_m, zero, tmp)
6210 ! Differentiate M2M along OZ
6211 call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_sk, p, vscales, &
6212 & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
6213 ! Transform into output harmonics for OY axis
6214 call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zy_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
6215 & sph_m_grad(:, 2))
6216 ! Differentiate for OZ axis
6217 call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_sk, p, vscales, &
6218 & one, sph_m, zero, sph_m_grad(:, 3))
6219end subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_grad
6220
6243subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
6244 & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6245 ! Inputs
6246 integer, intent(in) :: p
6247 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6248 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6249 ! Output
6250 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6251 ! Temporary workspace
6252 real(dp) :: work(2*(p+1))
6253 ! Call corresponding work routine
6254 call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
6255 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6256end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate
6257
6281subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
6282 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6283 ! Inputs
6284 integer, intent(in) :: p
6285 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6286 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6287 ! Output
6288 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6289 ! Temporary workspace
6290 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*(p+1))
6291 ! Local variables
6292 real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2
6293 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn
6294 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6295 real(dp), pointer :: pow_r1(:), pow_r2(:)
6296 ! Init output
6297 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6298 dst_l = zero
6299 else
6300 dst_l = beta * dst_l
6301 end if
6302 ! If harmonics have different centers
6303 if (z .ne. 0) then
6304 ! Prepare pointers
6305 pow_r1(1:p+1) => work(1:p+1)
6306 pow_r2(1:p+1) => work(p+2:2*(p+1))
6307 ! Get powers of r1 and r2
6308 r1 = z / src_r
6309 r2 = dst_r / z
6310 pow_r1(1) = 1
6311 pow_r2(1) = 1
6312 do j = 2, p+1
6313 pow_r1(j) = pow_r1(j-1) * r1
6314 pow_r2(j) = pow_r2(j-1) * r2
6315 end do
6316 ! Do actual L2L
6317 do j = 0, p
6318 indj = j*j + j + 1
6319 do k = 0, j
6320 tmp1 = alpha * pow_r2(j+1) / vfact(j-k+1) / vfact(j+k+1) * &
6321 & vscales(indj)
6322 do n = j, p
6323 indn = n*n + n + 1
6324 tmp2 = tmp1 * pow_r1(n+1) / vscales(indn) * &
6325 & vfact(n-k+1) * vfact(n+k+1) / vfact(n-j+1) / &
6326 & vfact(n-j+1)
6327 if (mod(n+j, 2) .eq. 1) then
6328 tmp2 = -tmp2
6329 end if
6330 if (k .eq. 0) then
6331 dst_l(indj) = dst_l(indj) + tmp2*src_l(indn)
6332 else
6333 dst_l(indj+k) = dst_l(indj+k) + tmp2*src_l(indn+k)
6334 dst_l(indj-k) = dst_l(indj-k) + tmp2*src_l(indn-k)
6335 end if
6336 end do
6337 end do
6338 end do
6339 ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6340 else
6341 r1 = dst_r / src_r
6342 tmp1 = alpha
6343 do j = 0, p
6344 indj = j*j + j + 1
6345 do k = indj-j, indj+j
6346 dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
6347 end do
6348 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6349 end do
6350 end if
6351end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work
6352
6374subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
6375 & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6376 ! Inputs
6377 integer, intent(in) :: p
6378 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6379 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6380 ! Output
6381 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6382 ! Temporary workspace
6383 real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
6384 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6385 ! Call corresponding work routine
6386 call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
6387 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6388end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate
6389
6413subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
6414 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6415 use complex_bessel
6416 ! Inputs
6417 integer, intent(in) :: p
6418 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6419 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6420 ! Output
6421 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6422 ! Temporary workspace
6423 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
6424 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6425 ! Local variables
6426 real(dp) :: r1, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2
6427 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
6428 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6429 real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
6430 complex(dp) :: complex_argument
6431 ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
6432 if (alpha .eq. zero) then
6433 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6434 dst_l = zero
6435 else
6436 dst_l = beta * dst_l
6437 end if
6438 return
6439 end if
6440 ! Get factorials
6441 fact(1) = one
6442 do j = 1, 2*p
6443 fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
6444 end do
6445 ! Now alpha is non-zero
6446 ! If harmonics have different centers
6447 if (z .ne. 0) then
6448 complex_argument = z
6449 call cbesi(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
6450 work(1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
6451 if (p .gt. 0) then
6452 call cbesi(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
6453 & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
6454 work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
6455 end if
6456 ! Do actual M2M
6457 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6458 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6459 dst_l = zero
6460 do j = 0, p
6461 ! Offset for dst_l
6462 indj = j*j + j + 1
6463 ! k = 0
6464 k = 0
6465 res1 = zero
6466 do n = 0, p
6467 ! Offset for src_l
6468 indn = n*n + n + 1
6469 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6470 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6471 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6472 tmp3 = zero
6473 do l = 0, min(j, n)
6474 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6475 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6476 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6477 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6478 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6479 end do
6480 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6481 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn)
6482 end do
6483 dst_l(indj) = res1
6484 ! k != 0
6485 do k = 1, j
6486 res1 = zero
6487 res2 = zero
6488 do n = k, p
6489 ! Offset for src_l
6490 indn = n*n + n + 1
6491 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6492 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6493 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6494 tmp3 = zero
6495 do l = k, min(j, n)
6496 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6497 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6498 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6499 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6500 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6501 end do
6502 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6503 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn+k)
6504 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indn-k)
6505 end do
6506 dst_l(indj+k) = res1
6507 dst_l(indj-k) = res2
6508 end do
6509 end do
6510 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6511 else
6512 do j = 0, p
6513 ! Offset for dst_l
6514 indj = j*j + j + 1
6515 ! k = 0
6516 k = 0
6517 res1 = zero
6518 do n = 0, p
6519 ! Offset for src_l
6520 indn = n*n + n + 1
6521 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6522 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6523 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6524 tmp3 = zero
6525 do l = 0, min(j, n)
6526 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6527 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6528 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6529 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6530 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6531 end do
6532 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6533 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn)
6534 end do
6535 dst_l(indj) = beta*dst_l(indj) + res1
6536 ! k != 0
6537 do k = 1, j
6538 res1 = zero
6539 res2 = zero
6540 do n = k, p
6541 ! Offset for src_l
6542 indn = n*n + n + 1
6543 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6544 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6545 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6546 tmp3 = zero
6547 do l = k, min(j, n)
6548 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6549 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6550 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6551 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6552 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6553 end do
6554 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6555 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indn+k)
6556 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indn-k)
6557 end do
6558 dst_l(indj+k) = beta*dst_l(indj+k) + res1
6559 dst_l(indj-k) = beta*dst_l(indj-k) + res2
6560 end do
6561 end do
6562 end if
6563 ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6564 else
6565 stop 'this code needs to be checked'
6566 r1 = zero
6567 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6568 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6569 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6570 tmp1 = alpha * r1
6571 do j = 0, p
6572 indj = j*j + j + 1
6573 do k = indj-j, indj+j
6574 dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_l(k)
6575 end do
6576 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6577 end do
6578 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6579 else
6580 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6581 tmp1 = alpha * r1
6582 do j = 0, p
6583 indj = j*j + j + 1
6584 do k = indj-j, indj+j
6585 dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_l(k)
6586 end do
6587 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6588 end do
6589 end if
6590 end if
6591end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work
6592
6614subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
6615 & src_l, beta, dst_l)
6616 ! Inputs
6617 integer, intent(in) :: p
6618 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6619 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6620 ! Output
6621 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6622 ! Temporary workspace
6623 real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
6624 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6625 ! Call corresponding work routine
6626 call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
6627 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6628end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj
6629
6653subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
6654 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
6655 use complex_bessel
6656 ! Inputs
6657 integer, intent(in) :: p
6658 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6659 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6660 ! Output
6661 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6662 ! Temporary workspace
6663 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
6664 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
6665 ! Local variables
6666 real(dp) :: r1, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2
6667 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
6668 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6669 real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
6670 complex(dp) :: complex_argument
6671 ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
6672 if (alpha .eq. zero) then
6673 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6674 dst_l = zero
6675 else
6676 dst_l = beta * dst_l
6677 end if
6678 return
6679 end if
6680 ! Get factorials
6681 fact(1) = one
6682 do j = 1, 2*p
6683 fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
6684 end do
6685 ! Now alpha is non-zero
6686 ! If harmonics have different centers
6687 if (z .ne. 0) then
6688 complex_argument = z
6689 call cbesi(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
6690 work(1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
6691 if (p .gt. 0) then
6692 call cbesi(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
6693 & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
6694 work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(pi/(2*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
6695 end if
6696 ! Do actual M2M
6697 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6698 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6699 dst_l = zero
6700 do n = 0, p
6701 ! Offset for dst_l
6702 indn = n*n + n + 1
6703 ! k = 0
6704 k = 0
6705 res1 = zero
6706 do j = 0, p
6707 ! Offset for src_l
6708 indj = j*j + j + 1
6709 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6710 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6711 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6712 tmp3 = zero
6713 do l = 0, min(j, n)
6714 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6715 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6716 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6717 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6718 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6719 end do
6720 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6721 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj)
6722 end do
6723 dst_l(indn) = res1
6724 ! k != 0
6725 do k = 1, n
6726 res1 = zero
6727 res2 = zero
6728 do j = k, p
6729 ! Offset for src_l
6730 indj = j*j + j + 1
6731 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6732 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6733 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6734 tmp3 = zero
6735 do l = k, min(j, n)
6736 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6737 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6738 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6739 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6740 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6741 end do
6742 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6743 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj+k)
6744 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indj-k)
6745 end do
6746 dst_l(indn+k) = res1
6747 dst_l(indn-k) = res2
6748 end do
6749 end do
6750 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6751 else
6752 do n = 0, p
6753 ! Offset for dst_l
6754 indn = n*n + n + 1
6755 ! k = 0
6756 k = 0
6757 res1 = zero
6758 do j = 0, p
6759 ! Offset for src_l
6760 indj = j*j + j + 1
6761 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6762 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
6763 !& src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6764 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6765 tmp3 = zero
6766 do l = 0, min(j, n)
6767 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6768 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6769 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6770 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6771 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6772 end do
6773 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6774 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj)
6775 end do
6776 dst_l(indn) = beta*dst_l(indn) + res1
6777 ! k != 0
6778 do k = 1, n
6779 res1 = zero
6780 res2 = zero
6781 do j = k, p
6782 ! Offset for src_l
6783 indj = j*j + j + 1
6784 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(j+n)) * &
6785 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
6786 & src_si(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1) * alpha
6787 tmp3 = zero
6788 do l = k, min(j, n)
6789 tmp2 = (two**(-l)) / &
6790 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
6791 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
6792 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
6793 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
6794 end do
6795 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
6796 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_l(indj+k)
6797 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_l(indj-k)
6798 end do
6799 dst_l(indn+k) = beta*dst_l(indn+k) + res1
6800 dst_l(indn-k) = beta*dst_l(indn-k) + res2
6801 end do
6802 end do
6803 end if
6804 ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6805 else
6806 stop 'this code needs to be checked'
6807 r1 = zero
6808 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
6809 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6810 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6811 tmp1 = alpha * r1
6812 do j = 0, p
6813 indj = j*j + j + 1
6814 do k = indj-j, indj+j
6815 dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_l(k)
6816 end do
6817 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6818 end do
6819 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
6820 else
6821 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
6822 tmp1 = alpha * r1
6823 do j = 0, p
6824 indj = j*j + j + 1
6825 do k = indj-j, indj+j
6826 dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_l(k)
6827 end do
6828 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6829 end do
6830 end if
6831 end if
6832end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work
6833
6857subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_si, p, vscales, &
6858 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6859 use complex_bessel
6860 ! Inputs
6861 integer, intent(in) :: p
6862 real(dp), intent(in) :: src_si(p+2), vscales((p+2)*(p+2)), &
6863 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6864 ! Output
6865 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+2)*(p+2))
6866 ! Derivative of the L2L is just a negative derivative of the M2M
6867 call fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_si, p, vscales, &
6868 & -alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6869end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work
6870
6893subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6894 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
6895 ! Inputs
6896 integer, intent(in) :: p
6897 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6898 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6899 ! Output
6900 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6901 ! Temporary workspace
6902 real(dp) :: work(2*(p+1))
6903 ! Call corresponding work routine
6904 call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6905 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6906end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj
6907
6931subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
6932 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
6933 ! Inputs
6934 integer, intent(in) :: p
6935 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
6936 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
6937 ! Output
6938 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
6939 ! Temporary workspace
6940 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*(p+1))
6941 ! Local variables
6942 real(dp) :: r1, r2, tmp1, tmp2
6943 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn
6944 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
6945 real(dp), pointer :: pow_r1(:), pow_r2(:)
6946 ! Init output
6947 if (beta .eq. zero) then
6948 dst_l = zero
6949 else
6950 dst_l = beta * dst_l
6951 end if
6952 ! If harmonics have different centers
6953 if (z .ne. 0) then
6954 ! Prepare pointers
6955 pow_r1(1:p+1) => work(1:p+1)
6956 pow_r2(1:p+1) => work(p+2:2*(p+1))
6957 ! Get powers of r1 and r2
6958 r1 = -z / dst_r
6959 r2 = -src_r / z
6960 pow_r1(1) = one
6961 pow_r2(1) = one
6962 do j = 2, p+1
6963 pow_r1(j) = pow_r1(j-1) * r1
6964 pow_r2(j) = pow_r2(j-1) * r2
6965 end do
6966 do j = 0, p
6967 indj = j*j + j + 1
6968 do k = 0, j
6969 tmp1 = alpha * pow_r2(j+1) / vfact(j-k+1) / vfact(j+k+1) * &
6970 & vscales(indj)
6971 do n = j, p
6972 indn = n*n + n + 1
6973 tmp2 = tmp1 * pow_r1(n+1) / vscales(indn) * &
6974 & vfact(n-k+1) * vfact(n+k+1) / vfact(n-j+1) / &
6975 & vfact(n-j+1)
6976 if (mod(n+j, 2) .eq. 1) then
6977 tmp2 = -tmp2
6978 end if
6979 if (k .eq. 0) then
6980 dst_l(indn) = dst_l(indn) + tmp2*src_l(indj)
6981 else
6982 dst_l(indn+k) = dst_l(indn+k) + tmp2*src_l(indj+k)
6983 dst_l(indn-k) = dst_l(indn-k) + tmp2*src_l(indj-k)
6984 end if
6985 end do
6986 end do
6987 end do
6988 ! If harmonics are located at the same point
6989 else
6990 r1 = src_r / dst_r
6991 tmp1 = alpha
6992 do j = 0, p
6993 indj = j*j + j + 1
6994 do k = indj-j, indj+j
6995 dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
6996 end do
6997 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
6998 end do
6999 end if
7000end subroutine fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work
7001
7021subroutine fmm_l2l_scale(src_r, dst_r, p, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
7022 ! Inputs
7023 integer, intent(in) :: p
7024 real(dp), intent(in) :: src_r, dst_r, alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7025 ! Output
7026 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7027 ! Local variables
7028 real(dp) :: r1, tmp1
7029 integer :: j, k, indj
7030 ! Init output
7031 if (beta .eq. zero) then
7032 dst_l = zero
7033 else
7034 dst_l = beta * dst_l
7035 end if
7036 r1 = dst_r / src_r
7037 tmp1 = alpha
7038 do j = 0, p
7039 indj = j*j + j + 1
7040 do k = indj-j, indj+j
7041 dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
7042 end do
7043 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
7044 end do
7045end subroutine fmm_l2l_scale
7046
7066subroutine fmm_l2l_scale_adj(src_r, dst_r, p, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
7067 ! Inputs
7068 integer, intent(in) :: p
7069 real(dp), intent(in) :: src_r, dst_r, alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7070 ! Output
7071 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7072 ! Local variables
7073 real(dp) :: r1, tmp1
7074 integer :: j, k, indj
7075 ! Init output
7076 if (beta .eq. zero) then
7077 dst_l = zero
7078 else
7079 dst_l = beta * dst_l
7080 end if
7081 r1 = src_r / dst_r
7082 tmp1 = alpha
7083 do j = 0, p
7084 indj = j*j + j + 1
7085 do k = indj-j, indj+j
7086 dst_l(k) = dst_l(k) + src_l(k)*tmp1
7087 end do
7088 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
7089 end do
7090end subroutine fmm_l2l_scale_adj
7091
7117subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
7118 & src_l, beta, dst_l)
7119 ! Inputs
7120 integer, intent(in) :: p
7121 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7122 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7123 ! Output
7124 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7125 ! Temporary workspace
7126 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p+19*p+8)
7127 ! Call corresponding work routine
7128 call fmm_l2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
7129 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7130end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation
7131
7158subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
7159 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7160 ! Inputs
7161 integer, intent(in) :: p
7162 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7163 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7164 ! Output
7165 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7166 ! Temporary workspace
7167 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7168 ! Local variables
7169 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7170 integer :: m, n
7171 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7172 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7173 ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7174 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7175 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7176 if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7177 ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7178 call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7179 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7180 return
7181 end if
7182 ! Prepare pointers
7183 m = (p+1)**2
7184 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7185 tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7186 n = n + m
7187 tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7188 n = n + m
7189 m = p + 1
7190 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7191 n = n + m
7192 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7193 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7194 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7195 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7196 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7197 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7198 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7199 & tmp_l2, work)
7200 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7201 call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, one, &
7202 & tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work)
7203 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7204 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7205 & work)
7206 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7207 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7208end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_work
7209
7234subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, alpha, &
7235 & src_l, beta, dst_l)
7236 use complex_bessel
7237 ! Inputs
7238 integer, intent(in) :: p
7239 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7240 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
7241 ! Output
7242 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7243 ! Temporary workspace
7244 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2
7245 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
7246 integer :: NZ, ierr
7247 ! Compute Bessel functions
7248 z1 = src_r * kappa
7249 z2 = dst_r * kappa
7250 s1 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z1)))
7251 s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
7252 call cbesi(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7253 src_si(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
7254 call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7255 dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
7256 if (p .gt. 0) then
7257 call cbesi(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7258 src_si(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7259 call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7260 dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7261 end if
7262 ! Call corresponding work routine
7263 call fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_work(c*kappa, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
7264 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7265end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation
7266
7292subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_work(c, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
7293 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7294 ! Inputs
7295 integer, intent(in) :: p
7296 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7297 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7298 ! Output
7299 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7300 ! Temporary workspace
7301 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7302 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
7303 ! Local variables
7304 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7305 integer :: m, n
7306 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7307 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7308 ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7309 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7310 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7311 !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7312 ! call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(abs(c(3)), src_si, dst_si, p, &
7313 ! & vscales, one, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7314 ! return
7315 !end if
7316 ! Prepare pointers
7317 m = (p+1)**2
7318 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7319 tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7320 n = n + m
7321 tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7322 n = n + m
7323 m = p + 1
7324 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7325 n = n + m
7326 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7327 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7328 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7329 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7330 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7331 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7332 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7333 & tmp_l2, work)
7334 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7335 call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(rho, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
7336 & one, tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work, work_complex)
7337 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7338 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7339 & work)
7340 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7341 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7342end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_work
7343
7368subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, alpha, &
7369 & src_l, beta, dst_l)
7370 use complex_bessel
7371 ! Inputs
7372 integer, intent(in) :: p
7373 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7374 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
7375 ! Output
7376 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7377 ! Temporary workspace
7378 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2
7379 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
7380 integer :: NZ, ierr
7381 ! Compute Bessel functions
7382 z1 = src_r * kappa
7383 z2 = dst_r * kappa
7384 s1 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z1)))
7385 s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
7386 call cbesi(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7387 src_si(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
7388 call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
7389 dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
7390 if (p .gt. 0) then
7391 call cbesi(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7392 src_si(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7393 call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
7394 dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
7395 end if
7396 ! Call corresponding work routine
7397 call fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(-c*kappa, dst_si, src_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
7398 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7399end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj
7400
7426subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(c, src_si, dst_si, p, vscales, &
7427 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7428 ! Inputs
7429 integer, intent(in) :: p
7430 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_si(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7431 & alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7432 ! Output
7433 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7434 ! Temporary workspace
7435 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7436 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
7437 ! Local variables
7438 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7439 integer :: m, n
7440 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7441 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7442 ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7443 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7444 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7445 !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7446 ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7447 ! call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(abs(c(3)), dst_si, src_si, p, &
7448 ! & vscales, one, src_l, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
7449 ! return
7450 !end if
7451 ! Prepare pointers
7452 m = (p+1)**2
7453 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7454 tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7455 n = n + m
7456 tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7457 n = n + m
7458 m = p + 1
7459 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7460 n = n + m
7461 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7462 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7463 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7464 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7465 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7466 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7467 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7468 & tmp_l2, work)
7469 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7470 call fmm_l2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, dst_si, src_si, p, vscales, &
7471 & one, tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work, work_complex)
7472 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7473 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7474 & work)
7475 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7476 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7477end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work
7478
7479subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_grad(p, sph_si, vscales, sph_l, sph_l_grad)
7480 !! Inputs
7481 integer, intent(in) :: p
7482 real(dp), intent(in) :: sph_si(p+2), vscales((p+2)**2), sph_l((p+1)**2)
7483 !! Output
7484 real(dp), intent(out) :: sph_l_grad((p+2)**2, 3)
7485 !! Local variables
7486 real(dp), dimension(3, 3) :: zx_coord_transform, zy_coord_transform
7487 real(dp) :: tmp((p+1)**2), tmp2((p+2)**2)
7488 ! Set coordinate transformations
7489 zx_coord_transform = zero
7490 zx_coord_transform(3, 2) = one
7491 zx_coord_transform(2, 3) = one
7492 zx_coord_transform(1, 1) = one
7493 zy_coord_transform = zero
7494 zy_coord_transform(1, 2) = one
7495 zy_coord_transform(2, 1) = one
7496 zy_coord_transform(3, 3) = one
7497 ! Transform input harmonics for OX axis
7498 call fmm_sph_transform(p, zx_coord_transform, one, sph_l, zero, tmp)
7499 ! Differentiate L2L along OZ
7500 call fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_si, p, vscales, &
7501 & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
7502 ! Transform into output harmonics for OX axis
7503 call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zx_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
7504 & sph_l_grad(:, 1))
7505 ! Transform input harmonics for OY axis
7506 call fmm_sph_transform(p, zy_coord_transform, one, sph_l, zero, tmp)
7507 ! Differentiate M2M along OZ
7508 call fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_si, p, vscales, &
7509 & one, tmp, zero, tmp2)
7510 ! Transform into output harmonics for OY axis
7511 call fmm_sph_transform(p+1, zy_coord_transform, one, tmp2, zero, &
7512 & sph_l_grad(:, 2))
7513 ! Differentiate for OZ axis
7514 call fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(sph_si, p, vscales, &
7515 & one, sph_l, zero, sph_l_grad(:, 3))
7516end subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_grad
7517
7543subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7544 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
7545 ! Inputs
7546 integer, intent(in) :: p
7547 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7548 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7549 ! Output
7550 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7551 ! Temporary workspace
7552 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7553 ! Call corresponding work routine
7554 call fmm_l2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, &
7555 & src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7556end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj
7557
7584subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7585 & alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7586 ! Inputs
7587 integer, intent(in) :: p
7588 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
7589 & vfact(2*p+1), alpha, src_l((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
7590 ! Output
7591 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
7592 ! Temporary workspace
7593 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
7594 ! Local variables
7595 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
7596 integer :: m, n
7597 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
7598 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_l(:), tmp_l2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
7599 ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
7600 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
7601 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
7602 if (stheta .eq. zero) then
7603 ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7604 call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, &
7605 & vfact, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l, work)
7606 return
7607 end if
7608 ! Prepare pointers
7609 m = (p+1)**2
7610 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
7611 tmp_l(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
7612 n = n + m
7613 tmp_l2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
7614 n = n + m
7615 m = p + 1
7616 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
7617 n = n + m
7618 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
7619 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
7620 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
7621 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7622 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_l)
7623 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7624 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, &
7625 & tmp_l2, work)
7626 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
7627 call fmm_l2l_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, &
7628 & one, tmp_l2, zero, tmp_l, work)
7629 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
7630 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_l, zero, tmp_l2, &
7631 & work)
7632 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
7633 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_l2, beta, dst_l)
7634end subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj_work
7635
7659subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7660 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l)
7661 ! Inputs
7662 integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
7663 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7664 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
7665 & beta
7666 ! Output
7667 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
7668 ! Temporary workspace
7669 real(dp) :: work((pm+2)*(pm+1))
7670 ! Call corresponding work routine
7671 call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7672 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7673end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate
7674
7699subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
7700 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
7701 ! Inputs
7702 integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
7703 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7704 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
7705 & beta
7706 ! Output
7707 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
7708 ! Temporary workspace
7709 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work((pm+2)*(pm+1))
7710 ! Local variables
7711 real(dp) :: tmp1, r1, r2, res1, res2, pow_r2
7712 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indk1, indk2
7713 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
7714 real(dp), pointer :: src_m2(:), pow_r1(:)
7715 ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
7716 if (alpha .eq. zero) then
7717 if (beta .eq. zero) then
7718 dst_l = zero
7719 else
7720 dst_l = beta * dst_l
7721 end if
7722 return
7723 end if
7724 ! Now alpha is non-zero
7725 ! z cannot be zero, as input sphere (multipole) must not intersect with
7726 ! output sphere (local)
7727 if (z .eq. zero) then
7728 return
7729 end if
7730 ! Prepare pointers
7731 n = (pm+1) ** 2
7732 src_m2(1:n) => work(1:n)
7733 pow_r1(1:pm+1) => work(n+1:n+pm+1)
7734 ! Get powers of r1 and r2
7735 r1 = src_r / z
7736 r2 = dst_r / z
7737 ! This abs(r1) makes it possible to work with negative z to avoid
7738 ! unnecessary rotation to positive z
7739 tmp1 = abs(r1)
7740 do j = 0, pm
7741 indj = j*j + j + 1
7742 pow_r1(j+1) = tmp1 / vscales(indj)
7743 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
7744 end do
7745 pow_r2 = one
7746 ! Reorder source harmonics from (degree, order) to (order, degree)
7747 ! Zero order k=0 at first
7748 do j = 0, pm
7749 indj = j*j + j + 1
7750 src_m2(j+1) = pow_r1(j+1) * src_m(indj)
7751 end do
7752 ! Non-zero orders next, a positive k followed by a negative -k
7753 indk1 = pm + 2
7754 do k = 1, pm
7755 n = pm - k + 1
7756 indk2 = indk1 + n
7757 !!GCC$ unroll 4
7758 do j = k, pm
7759 indj = j*j + j + 1
7760 src_m2(indk1+j-k) = pow_r1(j+1) * src_m(indj+k)
7761 src_m2(indk2+j-k) = pow_r1(j+1) * src_m(indj-k)
7762 end do
7763 indk1 = indk2 + n
7764 end do
7765 ! Do actual M2L
7766 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
7767 if (beta .eq. zero) then
7768 do j = 0, pl
7769 ! Offset for dst_l
7770 indj = j*j + j + 1
7771 ! k = 0
7772 tmp1 = alpha * vscales(indj) * pow_r2
7773 pow_r2 = pow_r2 * r2
7774 res1 = zero
7775 !!GCC$ unroll 4
7776 do n = 0, pm
7777 res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_coef(n+1, 1, j+1)*src_m2(n+1)
7778 end do
7779 dst_l(indj) = tmp1 * res1
7780 ! k != 0
7781 !!GCC$ unroll 4
7782 do k = 1, j
7783 ! Offsets for src_m2
7784 indk1 = pm + 2 + (2*pm-k+2)*(k-1)
7785 indk2 = indk1 + pm - k + 1
7786 res1 = zero
7787 res2 = zero
7788 !!GCC$ unroll 4
7789 do n = k, pm
7790 res1 = res1 + &
7791 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7792 & src_m2(indk1+n-k)
7793 res2 = res2 + &
7794 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7795 & src_m2(indk2+n-k)
7796 end do
7797 dst_l(indj+k) = tmp1 * res1
7798 dst_l(indj-k) = tmp1 * res2
7799 end do
7800 end do
7801 else
7802 do j = 0, pl
7803 ! Offset for dst_l
7804 indj = j*j + j + 1
7805 ! k = 0
7806 tmp1 = alpha * vscales(indj) * pow_r2
7807 pow_r2 = pow_r2 * r2
7808 res1 = zero
7809 do n = 0, pm
7810 res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_coef(n+1, 1, j+1)*src_m2(n+1)
7811 end do
7812 dst_l(indj) = beta*dst_l(indj) + tmp1*res1
7813 ! k != 0
7814 do k = 1, j
7815 ! Offsets for src_m2
7816 indk1 = pm + 2 + (2*pm-k+2)*(k-1)
7817 indk2 = indk1 + pm - k + 1
7818 res1 = zero
7819 res2 = zero
7820 do n = k, pm
7821 res1 = res1 + &
7822 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7823 & src_m2(indk1+n-k)
7824 res2 = res2 + &
7825 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(n-k+1, k+1, j-k+1)* &
7826 & src_m2(indk2+n-k)
7827 end do
7828 dst_l(indj+k) = beta*dst_l(indj+k) + tmp1*res1
7829 dst_l(indj-k) = beta*dst_l(indj-k) + tmp1*res2
7830 end do
7831 end do
7832 end if
7833end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work
7834
7858subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj(z, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
7859 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m)
7860 ! Inputs
7861 integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
7862 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7863 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
7864 & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
7865 ! Output
7866 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
7867 ! Temporary workspace
7868 real(dp) :: work((pl+2)*(pl+1))
7869 ! Call corresponding work routine
7870 call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
7871 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
7872end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj
7873
7897subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
7898 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
7899 ! Inputs
7900 integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
7901 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)*(pm+pl+1)), &
7902 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
7903 & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
7904 ! Output
7905 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
7906 ! Temporary workspace
7907 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work((pl+2)*(pl+1))
7908 ! Local variables
7909 real(dp) :: tmp1, r1, r2, pow_r1, res1, res2
7910 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, indk1, indk2
7911 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
7912 real(dp), pointer :: pow_r2(:), src_l2(:)
7913 ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
7914 if (alpha .eq. zero) then
7915 if (beta .eq. zero) then
7916 dst_m = zero
7917 else
7918 dst_m = beta * dst_m
7919 end if
7920 return
7921 end if
7922 ! Now alpha is non-zero
7923 ! z cannot be zero, as input sphere (multipole) must not intersect with
7924 ! output sphere (local)
7925 if (z .eq. zero) then
7926 return
7927 end if
7928 ! Prepare pointers
7929 n = (pl+1) ** 2
7930 src_l2(1:n) => work(1:n)
7931 pow_r2(1:pl+1) => work(n+1:n+pl+1)
7932 ! Get powers of r1 and r2
7933 r1 = -dst_r / z
7934 r2 = -src_r / z
7935 ! This abs(r1) makes it possible to work with negative z to avoid
7936 ! unnecessary rotation to positive z
7937 tmp1 = one
7938 do j = 0, pl
7939 indj = j*j + j + 1
7940 pow_r2(j+1) = tmp1 * vscales(indj)
7941 tmp1 = tmp1 * r2
7942 end do
7943 pow_r1 = abs(r1)
7944 ! Reorder source harmonics from (degree, order) to (order, degree)
7945 ! Zero order k=0 at first
7946 do j = 0, pl
7947 indj = j*j + j + 1
7948 src_l2(j+1) = pow_r2(j+1) * src_l(indj)
7949 end do
7950 ! Non-zero orders next, a positive k followed by a negative -k
7951 indk1 = pl + 2
7952 do k = 1, pl
7953 n = pl - k + 1
7954 indk2 = indk1 + n
7955 do j = k, pl
7956 indj = j*j + j + 1
7957 src_l2(indk1+j-k) = pow_r2(j+1) * src_l(indj+k)
7958 src_l2(indk2+j-k) = pow_r2(j+1) * src_l(indj-k)
7959 end do
7960 indk1 = indk2 + n
7961 end do
7962 ! Do actual adjoint M2L
7963 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
7964 if (beta .eq. zero) then
7965 do n = 0, pm
7966 indn = n*n + n + 1
7967 ! k = 0
7968 tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1 / vscales(indn)
7969 pow_r1 = pow_r1 * r1
7970 res1 = zero
7971 do j = 0, pl
7972 indj = j*j + j + 1
7973 res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j+1, 1, n+1)*src_l2(j+1)
7974 end do
7975 dst_m(indn) = tmp1 * res1
7976 ! k != 0
7977 do k = 1, n
7978 ! Offsets for src_l2
7979 indk1 = pl + 2 + (2*pl-k+2)*(k-1)
7980 indk2 = indk1 + pl - k + 1
7981 res1 = zero
7982 res2 = zero
7983 do j = k, pl
7984 indj = j*j + j + 1
7985 res1 = res1 + &
7986 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
7987 & src_l2(indk1+j-k)
7988 res2 = res2 + &
7989 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
7990 & src_l2(indk2+j-k)
7991 end do
7992 dst_m(indn+k) = tmp1 * res1
7993 dst_m(indn-k) = tmp1 * res2
7994 end do
7995 end do
7996 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
7997 else
7998 do n = 0, pm
7999 indn = n*n + n + 1
8000 ! k = 0
8001 tmp1 = alpha * pow_r1 / vscales(indn)
8002 pow_r1 = pow_r1 * r1
8003 res1 = zero
8004 do j = 0, pl
8005 indj = j*j + j + 1
8006 res1 = res1 + m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j+1, 1, n+1)*src_l2(j+1)
8007 end do
8008 dst_m(indn) = beta*dst_m(indn) + tmp1*res1
8009 ! k != 0
8010 do k = 1, n
8011 ! Offsets for src_l2
8012 indk1 = pl + 2 + (2*pl-k+2)*(k-1)
8013 indk2 = indk1 + pl - k + 1
8014 res1 = zero
8015 res2 = zero
8016 do j = k, pl
8017 indj = j*j + j + 1
8018 res1 = res1 + &
8019 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
8020 & src_l2(indk1+j-k)
8021 res2 = res2 + &
8022 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(j-k+1, k+1, n-k+1)* &
8023 & src_l2(indk2+j-k)
8024 end do
8025 dst_m(indn+k) = beta*dst_m(indn+k) + tmp1*res1
8026 dst_m(indn-k) = beta*dst_m(indn-k) + tmp1*res2
8027 end do
8028 end do
8029 end if
8030end subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work
8031
8058subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
8059 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l)
8060 ! Inputs
8061 integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
8062 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
8063 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
8064 & beta
8065 ! Output
8066 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
8067 ! Temporary workspace
8068 real(dp) :: work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
8069 ! Call corresponding work routine
8070 call fmm_m2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
8071 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
8072end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation
8073
8102subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
8103 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
8104 ! Inputs
8105 integer, intent(in) :: pm, pl
8106 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
8107 & m2l_ztranslate_coef(pm+1, pl+1, pl+1), alpha, src_m((pm+1)*(pm+1)), &
8108 & beta
8109 ! Output
8110 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((pl+1)*(pl+1))
8111 ! Temporary workspace
8112 real(dp), intent(out), target :: &
8113 & work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
8114 ! Local variables
8115 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
8116 integer :: m, n, p
8117 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
8118 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_ml(:), tmp_ml2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
8119 ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
8120 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
8121 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
8122 if (stheta .eq. zero) then
8123 ! Workspace here is (pm+2)*(pm+1)
8124 call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
8125 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work)
8126 return
8127 end if
8128 ! Prepare pointers
8129 p = max(pm, pl)
8130 m = (p+1)**2
8131 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
8132 tmp_ml(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
8133 n = n + m
8134 tmp_ml2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
8135 n = n + m
8136 m = p + 1
8137 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
8138 n = n + m
8139 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
8140 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
8141 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
8142 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8143 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(pm, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_ml)
8144 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pm*pm+13*pm+4
8145 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pm, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
8146 & tmp_ml2, work)
8147 ! OZ translation, workspace here is (pm+2)*(pm+1)
8148 call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, &
8149 & m2l_ztranslate_coef, one, tmp_ml2, zero, tmp_ml, work)
8150 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pl*pl+13*pl+4
8151 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pl, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
8152 & tmp_ml2, work)
8153 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8154 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(pl, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_ml2, beta, dst_l)
8155end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_work
8156
8181subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, alpha, &
8182 & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8183 use complex_bessel
8184 ! Inputs
8185 integer, intent(in) :: p
8186 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8187 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
8188 ! Output
8189 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8190 ! Temporary workspace
8191 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2
8192 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
8193 integer :: NZ, ierr
8194 ! Compute Bessel functions
8195 z1 = src_r * kappa
8196 z2 = dst_r * kappa
8197 s1 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z1)))
8198 s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
8199 call cbesk(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8200 src_sk(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
8201 call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8202 dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
8203 if (p .gt. 0) then
8204 call cbesk(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
8205 src_sk(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
8206 call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
8207 dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
8208 end if
8209 ! Call corresponding work routine
8210 call fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_work(c*kappa, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
8211 & src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8212end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation
8213
8239subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_work(c, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
8240 & src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8241 ! Inputs
8242 integer, intent(in) :: p
8243 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8244 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8245 ! Output
8246 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8247 ! Temporary workspace
8248 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
8249 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8250 ! Local variables
8251 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
8252 integer :: m, n
8253 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
8254 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
8255 ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
8256 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
8257 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
8258 !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
8259 ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
8260 ! call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, &
8261 ! & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
8262 ! return
8263 !end if
8264 ! Prepare pointers
8265 m = (p+1)**2
8266 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
8267 tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
8268 n = n + m
8269 tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
8270 n = n + m
8271 m = p + 1
8272 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
8273 n = n + m
8274 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
8275 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
8276 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
8277 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8278 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
8279 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8280 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
8281 & tmp_m2, work)
8282 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
8283 call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(rho, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, one, &
8284 & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
8285 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8286 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
8287 & work)
8288 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8289 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_l)
8290end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_work
8291
8316subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, alpha, &
8317 & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8318 use complex_bessel
8319 ! Inputs
8320 integer, intent(in) :: p
8321 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8322 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta, kappa
8323 ! Output
8324 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8325 ! Temporary workspace
8326 real(dp) :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), s1, s2, ck(3)
8327 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1), z1, z2
8328 integer :: NZ, ierr
8329 ! Compute Bessel functions
8330 z1 = src_r * kappa
8331 z2 = dst_r * kappa
8332 s1 = sqrt(2/(pi*real(z1)))
8333 s2 = sqrt(pi/(2*real(z2)))
8334 call cbesk(z1, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8335 src_sk(1) = s1 * real(work_complex(1))
8336 call cbesi(z2, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8337 dst_si(1) = s2 * real(work_complex(1))
8338 if (p .gt. 0) then
8339 call cbesk(z1, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
8340 src_sk(2:p+1) = s1 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
8341 call cbesi(z2, 1.5d0, 1, p, work_complex(2:p+1), nz, ierr)
8342 dst_si(2:p+1) = s2 * real(work_complex(2:p+1))
8343 end if
8344 ! Call corresponding work routine
8345 ck = - c*kappa
8346 call fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(ck, dst_si, src_sk, p, vscales, &
8347 & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8348end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj
8349
8375subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work(c, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
8376 & src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8377 ! Inputs
8378 integer, intent(in) :: p
8379 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8380 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8381 ! Output
8382 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8383 ! Temporary workspace
8384 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(6*p*p + 19*p + 8)
8385 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8386 ! Local variables
8387 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
8388 integer :: m, n
8389 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
8390 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_m(:), tmp_m2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
8391 ! Convert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
8392 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
8393 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
8394 !if (stheta .eq. zero) then
8395 ! ! Workspace here is 2*(p+1)
8396 ! call fmm_m2m_bessel_ztranslate_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, &
8397 ! & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
8398 ! return
8399 !end if
8400 ! Prepare pointers
8401 m = (p+1)**2
8402 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
8403 tmp_m(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
8404 n = n + m
8405 tmp_m2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
8406 n = n + m
8407 m = p + 1
8408 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
8409 n = n + m
8410 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
8411 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
8412 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
8413 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8414 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(p, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_m, zero, tmp_m)
8415 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8416 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, &
8417 & tmp_m2, work)
8418 ! OZ translation, workspace here is 2*(p+1)
8419 call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, one, &
8420 & tmp_m2, zero, tmp_m, work, work_complex)
8421 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*p*p+13*p+4
8422 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_m, zero, tmp_m2, &
8423 & work)
8424 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
8425 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(p, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_m2, beta, dst_l)
8426end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation_adj_work
8427
8449subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
8450 & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8451 ! Inputs
8452 integer, intent(in) :: p
8453 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8454 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8455 ! Output
8456 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8457 ! Temporary workspace
8458 real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
8459 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8460 ! Call corresponding work routine
8461 call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, &
8462 & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8463end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate
8464
8488subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, &
8489 & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8490 use complex_bessel
8491 ! Inputs
8492 integer, intent(in) :: p
8493 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8494 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8495 ! Output
8496 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8497 ! Temporary workspace
8498 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
8499 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8500 ! Local variables
8501 real(dp) :: r1, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2
8502 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
8503 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
8504 real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
8505 complex(dp) :: complex_argument
8506 ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
8507 if (alpha .eq. zero) then
8508 if (beta .eq. zero) then
8509 dst_l = zero
8510 else
8511 dst_l = beta * dst_l
8512 end if
8513 return
8514 end if
8515 ! Get factorials
8516 fact(1) = one
8517 do j = 1, 2*p
8518 fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
8519 end do
8520 ! Now alpha is non-zero
8521 ! If harmonics have different centers
8522 if (z .ne. 0) then
8523 complex_argument = z
8524 call cbesk(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8525 work(1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
8526 if (p .gt. 0) then
8527 call cbesk(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
8528 & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
8529 work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
8530 end if
8531 ! Do actual M2M
8532 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8533 if (beta .eq. zero) then
8534 dst_l = zero
8535 do j = 0, p
8536 ! Offset for dst_m
8537 indj = j*j + j + 1
8538 ! k = 0
8539 k = 0
8540 res1 = zero
8541 do n = 0, p
8542 ! Offset for src_m
8543 indn = n*n + n + 1
8544 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8545 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
8546 & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1)
8547 tmp3 = zero
8548 do l = 0, min(j, n)
8549 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8550 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8551 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8552 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8553 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8554 end do
8555 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8556 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
8557 end do
8558 dst_l(indj) = res1
8559 ! k != 0
8560 do k = 1, j
8561 res1 = zero
8562 res2 = zero
8563 do n = k, p
8564 ! Offset for src_m
8565 indn = n*n + n + 1
8566 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8567 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
8568 & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1)
8569 tmp3 = zero
8570 do l = k, min(j, n)
8571 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8572 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8573 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8574 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8575 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8576 end do
8577 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8578 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
8579 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
8580 end do
8581 dst_l(indj+k) = res1
8582 dst_l(indj-k) = res2
8583 end do
8584 end do
8585 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8586 else
8587 do j = 0, p
8588 ! Offset for dst_m
8589 indj = j*j + j + 1
8590 ! k = 0
8591 k = 0
8592 res1 = zero
8593 do n = 0, p
8594 ! Offset for src_m
8595 indn = n*n + n + 1
8596 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8597 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) / &
8598 & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj) * dst_si(j+1)
8599 tmp3 = zero
8600 do l = 0, min(j, n)
8601 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8602 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8603 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8604 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8605 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8606 end do
8607 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8608 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn)
8609 end do
8610 dst_l(indj) = beta*dst_l(indj) + res1
8611 ! k != 0
8612 do k = 1, j
8613 res1 = zero
8614 res2 = zero
8615 do n = k, p
8616 ! Offset for src_m
8617 indn = n*n + n + 1
8618 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8619 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) / &
8620 & src_sk(n+1) / vscales(indj+k) * dst_si(j+1)
8621 tmp3 = zero
8622 do l = k, min(j, n)
8623 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8624 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8625 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8626 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8627 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8628 end do
8629 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8630 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indn+k)
8631 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indn-k)
8632 end do
8633 dst_l(indj+k) = beta*dst_l(indj+k) + res1
8634 dst_l(indj-k) = beta*dst_l(indj-k) + res2
8635 end do
8636 end do
8637 end if
8638 ! If harmonics are located at the same point
8639 else
8640 stop 'this code needs to be checked'
8641 r1 = zero
8642 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8643 if (beta .eq. zero) then
8644 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8645 tmp1 = alpha * r1
8646 do j = 0, p
8647 indj = j*j + j + 1
8648 do k = indj-j, indj+j
8649 dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
8650 end do
8651 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8652 end do
8653 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8654 else
8655 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8656 tmp1 = alpha * r1
8657 do j = 0, p
8658 indj = j*j + j + 1
8659 do k = indj-j, indj+j
8660 dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
8661 end do
8662 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8663 end do
8664 end if
8665 end if
8666end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_work
8667
8689subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, alpha, &
8690 & src_m, beta, dst_l)
8691 ! Inputs
8692 integer, intent(in) :: p
8693 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8694 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8695 ! Output
8696 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8697 ! Temporary workspace
8698 real(dp) :: work(2*p+1)
8699 complex(dp) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8700 ! Call corresponding work routine
8701 call fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, &
8702 & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8703end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj
8704
8728subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work(z, src_sk, dst_si, p, vscales, &
8729 & alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l, work, work_complex)
8730 use complex_bessel
8731 ! Inputs
8732 integer, intent(in) :: p
8733 real(dp), intent(in) :: z, src_sk(p+1), dst_si(p+1), vscales((p+1)*(p+1)), &
8734 & alpha, src_m((p+1)*(p+1)), beta
8735 ! Output
8736 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_l((p+1)*(p+1))
8737 ! Temporary workspace
8738 real(dp), intent(out), target :: work(2*p+1)
8739 complex(dp), intent(out) :: work_complex(2*p+1)
8740 ! Local variables
8741 real(dp) :: r1, tmp1, tmp2, tmp3, res1, res2
8742 integer :: j, k, n, indj, indn, l, NZ, ierr
8743 ! Pointers for temporary values of powers
8744 real(dp) :: fact(2*p+1)
8745 complex(dp) :: complex_argument
8746 ! In case alpha is zero just do a proper scaling of output
8747 if (alpha .eq. zero) then
8748 if (beta .eq. zero) then
8749 dst_l = zero
8750 else
8751 dst_l = beta * dst_l
8752 end if
8753 return
8754 end if
8755 ! Get factorials
8756 fact(1) = one
8757 do j = 1, 2*p
8758 fact(j+1) = dble(j) * fact(j)
8759 end do
8760 ! Now alpha is non-zero
8761 ! If harmonics have different centers
8762 if (z .ne. 0) then
8763 complex_argument = z
8764 call cbesk(complex_argument, pt5, 1, 1, work_complex(1), nz, ierr)
8765 work(1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(1))
8766 if (p .gt. 0) then
8767 call cbesk(complex_argument, 1.5d0, 1, 2*p, &
8768 & work_complex(2:2*p+1), nz, ierr)
8769 work(2:2*p+1) = sqrt(2/(pi*z)) * real(work_complex(2:2*p+1))
8770 end if
8771 ! Do actual M2M
8772 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8773 if (beta .eq. zero) then
8774 dst_l = zero
8775 do n = 0, p
8776 ! Offset for dst_m
8777 indn = n*n + n + 1
8778 ! k = 0
8779 k = 0
8780 res1 = zero
8781 do j = 0, p
8782 ! Offset for src_m
8783 indj = j*j + j + 1
8784 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8785 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) * &
8786 & src_sk(j+1) / vscales(indj) / dst_si(n+1)
8787 tmp3 = zero
8788 do l = 0, min(j, n)
8789 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8790 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8791 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8792 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8793 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8794 end do
8795 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8796 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj)
8797 end do
8798 dst_l(indn) = res1
8799 ! k != 0
8800 do k = 1, n
8801 res1 = zero
8802 res2 = zero
8803 do j = k, p
8804 ! Offset for src_m
8805 indj = j*j + j + 1
8806 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8807 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) * &
8808 & src_sk(j+1) / vscales(indj+k) / dst_si(n+1)
8809 tmp3 = zero
8810 do l = k, min(j, n)
8811 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8812 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8813 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8814 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8815 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8816 end do
8817 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8818 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj+k)
8819 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indj-k)
8820 end do
8821 dst_l(indn+k) = res1
8822 dst_l(indn-k) = res2
8823 end do
8824 end do
8825 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8826 else
8827 do n = 0, p
8828 ! Offset for dst_m
8829 indn = n*n + n + 1
8830 ! k = 0
8831 k = 0
8832 res1 = zero
8833 do j = 0, p
8834 ! Offset for src_m
8835 indj = j*j + j + 1
8836 tmp1 = vscales(indn) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8837 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j+1) * fact(n+1) * &
8838 & src_sk(j+1) / vscales(indj) / dst_si(n+1)
8839 tmp3 = zero
8840 do l = 0, min(j, n)
8841 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8842 & fact(l+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8843 & fact(l+1)/fact(l+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8844 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8845 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8846 end do
8847 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8848 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj)
8849 end do
8850 dst_l(indn) = beta*dst_l(indn) + res1
8851 ! k != 0
8852 do k = 1, n
8853 res1 = zero
8854 res2 = zero
8855 do j = k, p
8856 ! Offset for src_m
8857 indj = j*j + j + 1
8858 tmp1 = vscales(indn+k) * ((-one)**(n)) * &
8859 & dble(2*j+1) * fact(j-k+1) * fact(n+k+1) * &
8860 & src_sk(j+1) / vscales(indj+k) / dst_si(n+1)
8861 tmp3 = zero
8862 do l = k, min(j, n)
8863 tmp2 = ((-two)**(-l)) / &
8864 & fact(l+k+1)*fact(2*l+1)/ &
8865 & fact(l+1)/fact(l-k+1)/fact(j-l+1)/fact(n-l+1)* &
8866 & (work(j+n-l+1) / (z**l))
8867 tmp3 = tmp3 + tmp2
8868 end do
8869 tmp3 = tmp3 * tmp1
8870 res1 = res1 + tmp3*src_m(indj+k)
8871 res2 = res2 + tmp3*src_m(indj-k)
8872 end do
8873 dst_l(indn+k) = beta*dst_l(indn+k) + res1
8874 dst_l(indn-k) = beta*dst_l(indn-k) + res2
8875 end do
8876 end do
8877 end if
8878 ! If harmonics are located at the same point
8879 else
8880 stop 'this code needs to be checked'
8881 r1 = zero
8882 ! Overwrite output if beta is zero
8883 if (beta .eq. zero) then
8884 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8885 tmp1 = alpha * r1
8886 do j = 0, p
8887 indj = j*j + j + 1
8888 do k = indj-j, indj+j
8889 dst_l(k) = tmp1 * src_m(k)
8890 end do
8891 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8892 end do
8893 ! Update output if beta is non-zero
8894 else
8895 !r1 = src_r / dst_r
8896 tmp1 = alpha * r1
8897 do j = 0, p
8898 indj = j*j + j + 1
8899 do k = indj-j, indj+j
8900 dst_l(k) = beta*dst_l(k) + tmp1*src_m(k)
8901 end do
8902 tmp1 = tmp1 * r1
8903 end do
8904 end if
8905 end if
8906end subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_ztranslate_adj_work
8907
8934subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8935 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m)
8936 ! Inputs
8937 integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
8938 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
8939 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
8940 & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
8941 ! Output
8942 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
8943 ! Temporary workspace
8944 real(dp) :: work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
8945 ! Call corresponding work routine
8946 call fmm_m2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8947 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
8948end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj
8949
8978subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj_work(c, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
8979 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
8980 ! Inputs
8981 integer, intent(in) :: pl, pm
8982 real(dp), intent(in) :: c(3), src_r, dst_r, vscales((pm+pl+1)**2), &
8983 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef(pl+1, pl+1, pm+1), alpha, &
8984 & src_l((pl+1)*(pl+1)), beta
8985 ! Output
8986 real(dp), intent(inout) :: dst_m((pm+1)*(pm+1))
8987 ! Temporary workspace
8988 real(dp), intent(out), target :: &
8989 & work(6*max(pm, pl)**2 + 19*max(pm, pl) + 8)
8990 ! Local variables
8991 real(dp) :: rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi
8992 integer :: m, n, p
8993 ! Pointers for temporary values of harmonics
8994 real(dp), pointer :: tmp_ml(:), tmp_ml2(:), vcos(:), vsin(:)
8995 ! Covert Cartesian coordinates into spherical
8996 call carttosph(c, rho, ctheta, stheta, cphi, sphi)
8997 ! If no need for rotations, just do translation along z
8998 if (stheta .eq. 0) then
8999 ! Workspace here is (pl+2)*(pl+1)
9000 call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(c(3), src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
9001 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_m, work)
9002 return
9003 end if
9004 ! Prepare pointers
9005 p = max(pm, pl)
9006 m = (p+1)**2
9007 n = 4*m + 5*p ! 4*p*p + 13*p + 4
9008 tmp_ml(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 5*p*p + 15*p + 5
9009 n = n + m
9010 tmp_ml2(1:m) => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 17*p + 6
9011 n = n + m
9012 m = p + 1
9013 vcos => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 18*p + 7
9014 n = n + m
9015 vsin => work(n+1:n+m) ! 6*p*p + 19*p + 8
9016 ! Compute arrays of cos and sin that are needed for rotations of harmonics
9017 call trgev(cphi, sphi, p, vcos, vsin)
9018 ! Rotate around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
9019 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_adj_work(pl, vcos, vsin, alpha, src_l, zero, tmp_ml)
9020 ! Perform rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pl*pl+13*pl+4
9021 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pl, ctheta, -stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
9022 & tmp_ml2, work)
9023 ! OZ translation, workspace here is (pl+2)*(pl+1)
9024 call fmm_m2l_ztranslate_adj_work(rho, src_r, dst_r, pl, pm, vscales, &
9025 & m2l_ztranslate_adj_coef, one, tmp_ml2, zero, tmp_ml, work)
9026 ! Backward rotation in the OXZ plane, work size is 4*pm*pm+13*pm+4
9027 call fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(pm, ctheta, stheta, one, tmp_ml, zero, &
9028 & tmp_ml2, work)
9029 ! Backward rotation around OZ axis (work array might appear in the future)
9030 call fmm_sph_rotate_oz_work(pm, vcos, vsin, one, tmp_ml2, beta, dst_m)
9031end subroutine fmm_m2l_rotation_adj_work
9032
9033end module ddx_harmonics
9034

Adjoint M2P operation.

Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.

Adjoint scale L2L, when spherical harmonics are centered in the same point.

Direct M2M translation by 4 rotations and 1 translation.

subroutine fmm_m2l_bessel_rotation(c, src_r, dst_r, kappa, p, vscales, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l)
Direct M2M translation by 4 rotations and 1 translation.

Direct M2L translation by 4 rotations and 1 translation.

ddx_harmonics::fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work
subroutine fmm_l2l_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_si, p, vscales, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:6859
ddx_harmonics::fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work
subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_work(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m, work)
Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:4265
ddx_harmonics::fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work
subroutine fmm_sph_rotate_oxz_work(p, ctheta, stheta, alpha, src, beta, dst, work)
Transform spherical harmonics in the OXZ plane.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:3943
ddx_harmonics::fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj
subroutine fmm_m2m_ztranslate_adj(z, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vcnk, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
Adjoint M2M translation over OZ axis.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:5406
ddx_harmonics::fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work
subroutine fmm_m2m_bessel_derivative_ztranslate_work(src_sk, p, vscales, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_m)
Direct M2M translation over OZ axis.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:4919
ddx_harmonics::fmm_l2l_rotation_adj
subroutine fmm_l2l_rotation_adj(c, src_r, dst_r, p, vscales, vfact, alpha, src_l, beta, dst_l)
Adjoint L2L translation by 4 rotations and 1 translation.
Definition: ddx_harmonics.f90:7545
ddx_harmonics::fmm_m2l_ztranslate
subroutine fmm_m2l_ztranslate(z, src_r, dst_r, pm, pl, vscales, m2l_ztranslate_coef, alpha, src_m, beta, dst_l)
Direct M2L translation over OZ axis.
